The sound of a flute being played by a young boy drifts through the wind...

'''"Distant Voyage"''' &mdash; the web event for Genshin Impact's new character, [[Kaedehara Kazuha]], is out now.

==Event Details==
===Duration===
2021/06/24 – 2021/07/03 23:59 (UTC+8)
*Rewards cannot be claimed after the event ends. Please claim them in time.

===Requirements===
[[Adventure Rank]] 10 or above

===Game Rewards===
Upon completing the crafting of the boat, Travelers will obtain in-game items as rewards. Travelers can share the event page to receive a Kaedehara Kazuha mobile wallpaper.

===Summary===
During the event, Travelers will need to help Kaedehara Kazuha build a boat. Upon completion, you will receive in-game items as rewards.

==How to Participate==
*PC & Mobile: [https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/ys/event/e20210624-boat/index.html?utm_source=officialweb&utm_medium=news >>Click Here to Take Part in the Event<<]
**Once you have accessed the event page, please log in using your miHoYo account and select the appropriate server and corresponding character in order to ensure that you will be able to receive and claim your event rewards.
*PS4/PS5: Access from the event mail in the Paimon Menu > Mail
**During the event period, Travelers who were not yet at Adventure Rank 10 or above at the beginning of the event will receive the event mail upon reaching Adventure Rank 10.

==Gameplay Details==
# During the event, Travelers will need to help Kaedehara Kazuha build a boat. The boat is composed of 9 parts, with 3 parts to be crafted per each stage. After all 3 parts at the current stage are crafted, you will unlock the next stage.
# Each part consumes a crafting attempt, which can be acquired by completing Daily Tasks. When the remaining crafting attempts reach 0, no more parts can be crafted.
# The three parts required at each stage can be crafted simultaneously. The crafting process for each part takes 60 minutes.

===Obtaining Crafting Attempts===
Every day, you will obtain 1 crafting attempt by logging into the event page. You can also acquire more through completing Daily Tasks. *During the event, each Traveler will be able to obtain up to 3 crafting attempts each day.
